Rmd to get two lists of DEGs. One for infected and one for uninfected. 

Install/load packages needed: 
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```

Load the table that SR made. DEG list, with count data and blast output.
```{r}
degblast <- read.table("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sr320/nb-2019/master/C_bairdi/analyses/bigtable.txt", header = TRUE, sep = '\t')
head(degblast)
```
